short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show the full domain name on Hacker News next to titles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On Hacker News, for most sites only part of the domain name is shown. This extension makes it show the full domain name (unless it begins with www).
